927240.name: FPV Air 2 - Bando Freestyler
927240.description:
Bando Freestyler makes FPV Air 2 about more than just racing! New environments packed with all the dives, gaps and exciting locations you need for freestyle practice.

Included Environment:

The Mill

An old factory style buildings in a remote location with a mix of natural and man-made geometry

Docks

Shipping containers and Cranes galore!

Flop_Park

Playground equipment, monuments, Trees and all the other common good stuff you can find in public parks ideal for freestyle
927240.supported_languages:
英语*, 韩语, 简体中文, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
